item.description: We have a block of seats tickets along the third base line in Section Red 11, Rows EE & FF, from 14 to the end.  Just RSVPing : You can purchase tickets near us from the Pawsox ticket web site, they are 11$.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet at the main entrance near the ticket office. Look for John with a Virginia Tech cap. (He'll be near the information booth, if they have that out by the curb)
item.why: Baseball opening day is a classic way to get outside and celebrate the coming of spring. Seeing the PawSox play at McCoy Stadium is a fun time in a low-key atmosphere, and there will probably be a good crowd for this game. And tickets are cheap.
item.name: PawSox Opening Game
